    • Uses of Channel in org.jdrupes

      Classes in org.jdrupes that implement Channel 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractComponent
      A convenience base class for new components.
      class  ClassChannel
      The root base class for channels that use their class as key for matching channels with handlers.
      class  NamedChannel
      Support for named channels.
      Fields in org.jdrupes declared as Channel 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Channel Channel.BROADCAST
      A special channel that can be used to send events to all components.
      Methods in org.jdrupes that return Channel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Channel AbstractComponent.getChannel()
      Returns the channel associated with the component.
      Channel Manager.getChannel()
      Return the component's channel.
      Methods in org.jdrupes with parameters of type Channel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Fire the given event on the given channel.
      Constructors in org.jdrupes with parameters of type Channel 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractComponent(Channel componentChannel)
      Create the new component base with its channel set to the given channel.
